column1:
The "Forces of Darkness" Continuity Remoaners were out in force on the newspaper review programs tonight.
Corona virus is being treated as an anti-Brexit godsend - disgraceful.
#WTOexitnow
Let's leave before they start expecting us to bail out the failing economies of EU27.
